Info

Defines class TestHTTPHandler with attribute(s) and method(s). Extends AbstractHTTPHandler to handle HTTP requests with a custom connection and timeout.

class testspeednet.net.utils.test_http_handler.TestHTTPHandler(debuglevel: int | None = 0, timeout: int | None = 10)[source]¶

Bases: AbstractHTTPHandler

Defines class TestHTTPHandler with attribute(s) and method(s). Extends AbstractHTTPHandler to handle HTTP requests with a custom connection and timeout.

It defines:

attributes:
_TOOL_VERBOSE - Console text indicator for process-phase.
http_request - Callable for handling HTTP requests.
timeout - Maximum allowed time for the HTTP connection.
methods:
__init__ - Initializes an instance of TestHTTPHandler.
http_open - Opens the HTTP connection using a custom
connection class.
http_open(req: Request) → HTTPResponse[source]¶

Opens the HTTP connection using a custom connection class.

This method handles the opening of HTTP connections using the TestHTTPConnection class and specified timeout.

Parameters:

req (<Request>) – The request object to be sent.

Returns:

The HTTP response object.

Return type:

<HTTPResponse>

Exceptions:

None

http_request(request)¶
